name: Trump Election Simulator
description:
This game is best enjoyed at full screen! Beer is optional. Outside music is required.

The Trump Election Simulator is a game-jam type of game. Created in 3 hours, from the idea to the upload, it is inspired by the recent political developments.

To successfully Tweet your way to the Presidency, MASH the BLUE BIRD as fast as possible. Your supporters will rally behind you and you will gain support.  Remember, when things get rough, you can always call a friend abroad!

If you enjoyed the game, donate so I can make many, many more games like that.

Thank you and enjoy!

Pavel.
